lessons.title: Why Startups Win In The AI Era
lessons.author: Aaron Levie (Box) at YC AI Startup School
lessons.description: A deep dive into how startups can compete with incumbents in the age of AI.

lessons.description: Practical advice from Harvard Innovation Labs on forming your founding team and culture.

lessons.title: How to Get & Validate Startup Ideas
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: A workshop on techniques for brainstorming and testing startup ideas.

lessons.title: How to Start a Startup
lessons.author: Sam Altman, Dustin Moskovitz
lessons.description: A classic and foundational lecture on starting a company from two of the best in the industry.

lessons.title: How To Build a Billion Dollar Startup
lessons.author: Various Founders
lessons.description: A discussion with successful founders about their journey and the lessons they learned building their companies.

lessons.title: First-Time Founders and Leadership Styles
lessons.author: James Evans (CommandBar)
lessons.description: James Evans from CommandBar shares his journey and valuable lessons on leadership and team building for new founders.

lessons.title: How to Evaluate Startup Ideas
lessons.author: Kevin Hale (Y Combinator)
lessons.description: A Y Combinator partner breaks down how to vet and develop a good startup idea.

lessons.title: Product-Market Fit - Explained & Defined
lessons.author: Launch Y
lessons.description: An animated explanation of the crucial concept of product-market fit, defined by Marc Andreessen.

lessons.title: Why Startup Founders Struggle with Sales

lessons.description: This video provides a buyer-first approach to sales for founders who are struggling with inconsistent leads.

lessons.title: Avoiding Startup Mistakes At Every Stage
lessons.author: Mona Sabet
lessons.description: A discussion on common pitfalls founders face from launch to exit and how to avoid them.

lessons.title: How to finally start your first business in 2025
lessons.author: Ali Abdaal
lessons.description: A video that provides motivation and practical advice on overcoming the fear of starting and getting comfortable with uncertainty.

lessons.title: 30 Years of Business Knowledge in 2hrs 26mins

lessons.description: Simon Squibb condenses his decades of business experience into one comprehensive video.

lessons.title: We Selected the best 54 minutes of Business Advice

lessons.description: A compilation of valuable advice from successful business figures.

lessons.title: How to Write a Business Plan - Entrepreneurship 101
lessons.author: Brian Tracy
lessons.description: A step-by-step guide to creating a business plan from scratch.

lessons.title: 9 Steps to Creating a Successful Business Model

lessons.description: An explanation of the Business Model Canvas and how to use its nine segments to plan your business.
